title: Study of efficient techniques for implementing a Pseudo-Boolean solver based on cutting planes

abstract:

decades. But still they have some drawbacks such as the slow effi-

title: Design and development of a cognitive assistant for the architecting of earth observing satellites

abstract:

observation satellite systems. The motivation for such a system comes from
both the recent commercial success of different cognitive ...

title: USB Keylogger (Minimal USB driver implementation to work with a keyboard)

abstract:

USB keylogger, minimal USB driver implementation to work with a
